Paul Richmond’s Branching Out a local tree specialist providing a professional, no fuss affordable service for the maintenance of all your Trees, Palms and Shrubs to the Cairns and Tablelands Region

Branching Out Services

Tree Felling & Tree Removal

Trees can be felled in position or removed by sections. Our professional team offer efficient, reliable and courteous service.

Your property and existing plants will be respected and garden will be left clean and tidy.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

Tree Pruning

We remove deadwood, broken and diseased branches. Crown reshaping and lifting to maintain the natural shapes of trees is a specialty.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

Stump Grinding & Stump Removal

Removal of stumps to minimize the risk of spreading disease from removed affected trees.

You can then replant or have that lawn spread nice and thick.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

On Site Mulching & Waste Removal

All waste is mulched on site and transfered straight into our tipping truck. We can then take it away or place it on your property for use in your garden to improve the condition of your soil.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

Shrub & Hedge Pruning

Have you hedges and shrubs professionally trimmed and shaped in the correct manner by our fully trained team of aborists.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact

Consultancy & Survey Reports

For councils, developers, architects, surveyors, contractors and private residences for the preservation of trees on sites.

Reports and surveys to ascertain the health and safety of trees and assess the trees potential to cause damage to surrounding structures.

For a FREE quote call 0400 326 670 or Request Contact
